      #CybotCookiebotDialog.CybotEdge #CybotCookiebotDialogFooter #CybotCookiebotDialogBodyButtonsWrapper {
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      #CybotCookiebotDialogDetailBodyContentCookieContainerTypes .CybotCookiebotDialogDetailBodyContentCookieInfoWrapper {
        margin-top: 3.75em;
      }

        margin-bottom: 1.875em;
      }

        top: -2em;
      }

      }
    }

id="CybotCookiebotDialogBody" class="CybotCookiebotDialogTabPanel" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="CybotCookiebotDialogNavDeclaration" lang="lv"><div class="CybotCookiebotScrollContainer"><div id="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyContent" class="CybotCookiebotScrollArea"><div class="CybotCookiebotFader" style="background-image: linear-gradient(to top, rgb(255, 255, 255), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0));"></div><div id="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyContentTitle" class="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyContentHeading" lang="lv" role="heading" aria-level="2">Šī tīmekļa vietne izmanto sīkfailus</div><div id="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyContentText" lang="lv">Mēs izmantojam sīkfailus, lai personalizētu saturu un reklāmas, nodrošinātu sociālo saziņas līdzekļu funkcijas un analizētu mūsu datplūsmu. Informāciju par to, kā jūs izmantojat mūsu vietni, mēs arī kopīgojam ar saviem sociālās saziņas līdzekļu, reklamēšanas un analīzes partneriem, kuri to var apvienot ar citu informāciju, ko viņiem sniedzat vai ko viņi apkopo, kad lietojat viņu pakalpojumus. Uzzini vairāk <a href="https://www.maxima.lv/privatuma-politika-2" style="">Privātuma politikā</a> un <a href="https://www.maxima.lv/privatuma-politika-2" style="">Sīkdatņu politikā</a>. Savu izvēli jebkurā laikā varēsi mainīt, aktivizējot saiti&nbsp; Sīkdatņu deklarēšana. Lietojot šo vietni Jūs apstiprināt, ka sīkdatnes var tikt uzturētas arī ārpus Eiropas Savienības.</div></div><div class="CybotCookiebotScrollbarContainer"></div></div><div role="heading" aria-level="2">Par</div><div class="CybotCookiebotFader" style="background-image: linear-gradient(to top, rgb(255, 255, 255), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0));"></div>Sīkfaili ir mazi teksta faili, ko var izmantot tīmekļa vietnēs, lai lietotāja pieredzi padarītu efektīvāku.<br style=""><br style="">Likums nosaka, ka mēs varam saglabāt sīkfailus jūsu ierīcē, ja tie ir pilnīgi nepieciešams šīs vietnes darbībai. Citu veidu sīkfailiem ir nepieciešama jūsu atļauja.<br style=""><br style="">Š īvietne izmanto dažādu veidu sīkdatnes. Daži sīkfaili tiek izvietoti pēc trešās puses pakalpojumiem, kas parādās mūsu lapās.<br style=""><br style="">Jūs varat jebkurā laikā mainīt vai atsaukt savu piekrišanu, izmantojot mūsu tīmekļa vietnes sadaļu Sīkdatņu deklarēšana.<br style=""><br style=""><a href="https://www.maxima.lv/privatuma-politika-2" style="">Privātuma politikā</a> varat uzzināt, kas mēs esam, kā jūs varat ar mums sazināties un kā mēs apstrādājam personas datus.<br style=""><br style="">Kad sazinaties ar mums par savu piekrišanu, ludzu, noradiet piekrišanas ID un datumu.</div><div class="CybotCookiebotScrollbarContainer"></div></div></div><div id="CybotCookiebotDialogFooter" class="CybotCookiebotScrollContainer"><div class="CybotCookiebotScrollArea"><div id="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyButtons"><div class="CybotCookiebotDialogBodyLevelButtonWrapper CybotCookiebotDialogBodyContentControlsWrapper CybotCookiebotDialogHide <style>
    .video-with-gradient-banner {
        position: relative;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .video-with-gradient-banner img {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
    }

    .video-with-gradient-content {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .video-with-gradient-content .video-container {
        position: relative;
        float: left;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        right: 0;
        margin-top: 76vw;
        height: auto;
        max-width: 1000px;
        z-index: 1;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .video-with-gradient-content .video-container video {
        object-fit: cover;
        object-position: 50% 50%;
        width: 130% !important;
        margin-left: -15%;
        margin-top: -8%;
        height: auto !important;
        max-height: 100%;
        min-height: 100%;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.1s linear;
    }

    .video-with-gradient-banner .lv-slider__image--mobile.with-mask {
        z-index: 2;
        mask-image: linear-gradient(
                180deg,
                black 0%,
                black 55%,
                rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 60%,
                transparent 70%,
                transparent 100%
        );
        -webkit-mask-image: linear-gradient(
                180deg,
                black 0%,
                black 55%,
                rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 60%,
                transparent 70%,
                transparent 100%
        );
    }

    @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
        .video-with-gradient-content .video-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 51%;
            height: 100%;
            margin-top: 0;
        }

        .video-with-gradient-content .video-container video {
            width: 134% !important;
            margin-left: -17%;
            margin-top: 0;
        }

        .video-with-gradient-banner .lv-slider__image--desktop.with-mask {
            z-index: 2;
            mask-image: linear-gradient(
                    90deg,
                    black 0%,
                    black 50%,
                    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 55%,
                    transparent 60%,
                    transparent 100%
            );
            -webkit-mask-image: linear-gradient(
                    90deg,
                    black 0%,
                    black 50%,
                    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 55%,
                    transparent 60%,
                    transparent 100%
            );
        }

    }
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">

  $(document).ready(function () {
    $('.js-header-click').on('click', function (e) {
      let page ='lv-campaigns-slider';
      page = (page.length > 0) ? ('header-' + page) : 'header';

      let title = $(this).attr('href')  + ' (ID:' + $(this).closest('.lv-slider__slide').data('slide-id') + ')';

      $.ajax({
        url: '/ajax/formcustom/formcustomrender/ajaxItemView',
        dataType: 'json',
        type: 'post',
        data: {page: page, title: title,},
        cache: false,
      });

      gtag('event', 'Klikšķis', {
        event_category: 'Piedavajumi Campaigns SLIDER',
        event_label: ''}
      );

      //e.preventDefault();
    });

  });
</script>

<div id="lv-popup-offer" class="lv-popup-offer" style="display: none">
    <button type="button" class="lv-modal-close" onclick="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; $.fancybox.close(); return false;" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Aizvērt"></button>

<style>
    .info-notice-circle-1 {
        border-radius: 500px;
        color: #fff;
        background: #004A90;
        width: 80px;
        height: 80px;
        background-size: cover;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center center;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        z-index: 6;
        position: absolute;
    }

    .info-notice-circle-wrapper {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .info-notice-circle-title {
        font-size: 22px;
        line-height: 1.3;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: -7px;
    }

    .info-notice-circle-text {
        font-size: 10px;
        line-height: 1.3;
        font-weight: 600;
    }
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
    String.prototype.slugify = function (separator = "-") {
        return this
            .toString()
            .normalize('NFD')                   // split an accented letter in the base letter and the acent
            .replace(/[\u0300-\u036f]/g, '')   // remove all previously split accents
            .toLowerCase()
            .trim()
            .replace(/[^a-z0-9 ]/g, '')   // remove all chars not letters, numbers and spaces (to be replaced)
            .replace(/\s+/g, separator);
    };


    var filterClick = false;
    window.disableOffers = true;
    var previousSearchValue = '';
    var wait = (
        function() {
            var timer = 0;
            return function(callback, ms) {
                clearTimeout (timer);
                timer = setTimeout(callback, ms);
            }
        }
    )();

    function getUrlWithFilters(url) {
        let $form = $('#sales-filters-form');
        let strParams = $form.serialize();
        if (strParams == 'search=') {
            strParams = '';
        }

        return url + '?' + strParams;
    }

    function submitForm() {
        let $form = $('#sales-filters-form');
        let $totalProducts = $("#totalProducts");
        var $button = $('.lv-load-more');
        $button.attr('loading', '1');
        $button.addClass('loading');
        $('.alcohol-tooltip').hide();

        console.log( $form.serialize() );

        let categoriesStr = '';
        $form.find('input[name="categories[]"]').each(function() {
            if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                categoriesStr = categoriesStr + $(this).val() + ',';
            }
        });
        console.log(categoriesStr);
        if (categoriesStr == '42,') {
            $('#offers-title').hide();
        } else {
            $('#offers-title').show();
        }


        $.ajax({
            url: getUrlWithFilters($('#ajax-load-more-url').val()) + '&ajax=1',
            method: 'GET',
            cache: false,
            success: function (data) {
                let $offers = $(data.html);
                $("#offers_container").html(data.html);
                let offsetCount = $("#offers_container .offer-item").length;

                $('#totalProducts').val(data.totalItems);

                $button.show();
                $button.removeAttr('loading');
                $button.removeClass('loading');

                offers.prototype.initInfoBtn($(".offers .item .info"));
                offers.prototype.initInfoBtn($(".offers .item .tag"));

                initOffersPopup('.lv-offers-list .offers .item', '#lv-popup-offer');
                addCircleToOffers();

                if (offsetCount > 0) {
                    $('.offers-not-found').hide();
                } else {
                    $('.offers-not-found').show();
                }
            },
        });
    }

    function clearFilters() {
        // Shops
        $('.shop.shop-x input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
        $('.shop.shop-x').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');

        $('.shop.shop-xx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
        $('.shop.shop-xx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');

        $('.shop.shop-xxx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
        $('.shop.shop-xxx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');

        // Categories
        $('.lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
        $('.lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');

        // Filters
        $('.lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
        $('.lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');

        $('.shop_mobile.shop-x').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
        $('.shop_mobile.shop-xx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
        $('.shop_mobile.shop-xxx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');

        $('.lv-mobile-categories__item .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
        $('.lv-mobile-filters__item .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');

    }

    function showHiddenOffersAtBottom() {
        $('#offers_container .item-hidden').each(function(key, item) {
            let html = $(item).html();
            console.log(html);
            $("#offers_container").append('<div class="col-third offer-item restored-item">' + html + '</div>');
            $(this).remove();
        });
    }

    function isOnScreen(elem) {
        // if the element doesn't exist, abort
        if (elem.length == 0) {
            return;
        }

        var $window = $(window);
        var viewport_top = $window.scrollTop();
        var viewport_height = $window.height();
        var viewport_bottom = viewport_top + viewport_height;
        var $elem = $(elem);
        var top = $elem.offset().top;
        var height = $elem.height();
        var bottom = top + height;

        return (top >= viewport_top && top < viewport_bottom) ||
            (bottom > viewport_top && bottom <= viewport_bottom) ||
            (height > viewport_height && top <= viewport_top && bottom >= viewport_bottom);
    }

    function addCircleToOffers() {
      $('#offers_container .item').each(function () {
        let $item = $(this);
        if ($item.find('.info-notice-circle-1').length === 0) {
          let $tooltip = $item.find('.tags.info_icon .tag');
          //console.log($tooltip.length, $tooltip.data('alt'));
          if ($tooltip.length && $tooltip.data('alt').indexOf('NO TREŠDIENAS') !== -1) {
            let tooltipText = $tooltip.data('alt');
            let tooltipParts = tooltipText.split('<br>');
            let tooltipDate = tooltipParts[0].replace('NO TREŠDIENAS ', '');
            console.log(tooltipDate);
            $item.append(
                '<div class="info-notice-circle-1" style="right: 148px; top: 121px;">' +
                '    <div class="info-notice-circle-wrapper">' +
                '      <div class="info-notice-circle-title">NO</div>' +
                '      <div class="info-notice-circle-text">TREŠDIENAS<br>' + tooltipDate + '</div>' +
                '    </div>' +
                '</div>'
            );
          }
        }
      });
    }

    $(document).ready(function () {
        if (location.href.indexOf('#') > -1) {
            let urlParts = location.href.split('#');

            if (typeof urlParts[1] !== 'undefined' && urlParts[1].length > 0) {
                let filtersList = [urlParts[1]];
                if (urlParts[1].indexOf(';') > -1) {
                    filtersList = urlParts[1].split(';');
                }

                setTimeout(function () {
                    let filterTitle = '';

                    filtersList.forEach(function (value, index) {
                        let found = false;
                        filterTitle = value;
                        filterTitle = filterTitle.replace(/ /g, '-');
                        filterTitle = filterTitle.toLowerCase();

                        $('a.lv-filter-category').each(function () {
                            if (!found) {
                                let title = $(this).find('.lv-filter-category__label').html();
                                title = title.trim();

                                let titleURI = title.replace(/ /g, '-');
                                titleURI = encodeURI(titleURI);
                                titleURI = titleURI.toLowerCase();

                                if (filterTitle == titleURI) {
                                    title = titleURI;
                                } else {
                                    title = title.slugify('-');
                                }

                                if (filterTitle == title) {
                                    let $button = $(this);
                                    found = true;

                                    setTimeout(function () {
                                        $button.click();
                                    }, 100 + (index * 200));
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    });
                }, 400);
            }
        }

        $('.lv-filter-modal-trigger').on('click', function (e) {
            if (!filterClick) {
                console.log('filter init');
                clearFilters();
            }

            filterClick = true;
        });

        addCircleToOffers();

        $('input[name="search"]').on('keyup', function (e) {
            let $input = $(this);
            let $form = $('#sales-filters-form');
            let $autoCompleteBlock = $('#auto_complete');

            if(e.which != 13) {
                wait(function () {
                    if ($input.val().length > 2) {
                        $.ajax({
                            url: $('#ajax-search-products-url').val(),
                            data: {word: $input.val()},
                            method: 'POST',
                            cache: false,
                            success: function (response) {
                                if (response.success) {
                                    previousSearchValue = $input.val();
                                    $autoCompleteBlock.empty();
                                    $autoCompleteBlock.removeClass('item-selected');
                                    $autoCompleteBlock.append(response.html);

                                    $autoCompleteBlock.css({
                                        'top': $input.position().top + $input.height() + 3,
                                        'display': 'block'
                                    });

                                    $('html').click(function () {
                                        $autoCompleteBlock.css('display', 'none');
                                        if (!$autoCompleteBlock.hasClass('item-selected')) {
                                            $('input[name="search"]').val('');
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            },
                        });
                    } else if ($input.val() == '' && previousSearchValue != $input.val()) {
                        submitForm();
                        previousSearchValue = '';
                    }
                }, 900);
            }
        });

        $('input[name="search_mob"]').on('keyup', function (e) {
            let $input = $(this);
            let $form = $('#sales-filters-form');
            let $autoCompleteBlock = $('#auto_complete_mob');

            if (e.which != 13) {
                wait(function () {
                    if ($input.val().length > 2) {
                        $.ajax({
                            url: $('#ajax-search-products-url').val(),
                            data: {word: $input.val()},
                            method: 'POST',
                            cache: false,
                            success: function (response) {
                                if (response.success) {
                                    previousSearchValue = $input.val();
                                    $autoCompleteBlock.empty();
                                    $autoCompleteBlock.append(response.html);

                                    $autoCompleteBlock.css({
                                        'top': $input.position().top + $input.height() + 3,
                                        'display': 'block'
                                    });

                                    /*$('html').click(function() {
                                        $autoCompleteBlock.css('display', 'none');
                                        $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');
                                    });*/
                                }
                            },
                        });
                    } else if ($input.val() == '' && previousSearchValue != $input.val()) {
                        submitForm();
                        previousSearchValue = '';
                        $autoCompleteBlock.hide();
                    }
                }, 900);
            }
        });

        $('input[name="search"]').on('keypress', function (e) {
            if(e.which == 13) {
                let value = $(this).val();
                let $inputSearch = $('input[name="search"]');
                let $searchInputBlock = $inputSearch.closest('.sales-filter-search').find('#search_inputs');
                let $filtersPreviewList = $('.selected-filters-preview-list');

                previousSearchValue = '';
                clearFilters();
                $('#auto_complete').hide();

                let exists = false;
                let nameId = 0;
                $searchInputBlock.find('input').each(function (i, item) {
                    if ($(item).val() == value) {
                        exists = true;
                    }

                    nameId++;
                });

                nameId += 1;

                if (!exists && value != '') {
                    let $newSearchInput = $('<input/>', {name: 'search' + nameId, value: value});
                    $searchInputBlock.append($newSearchInput);

                    $filtersPreviewList.append(
                        '<div class="filter-preview-item filter-preview-search" data-id="search' + nameId + '">' +
                        '    <div class="filter-preview-title">' + value + '</div>' +
                        '    <div class="filter-remove-icon" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Remove"></div>' +
                        '</div>'
                    );
                }

                $inputSearch.val('');

                submitForm();

                e.preventDefault();
                return false;
            }
        });

        $('input[name="search_mob"]').on('keypress', function (e) {
            if(e.which == 13) {
                let value = $(this).val();
                let $inputSearch = $('input[name="search"]');
                let $searchInputBlock = $inputSearch.closest('.sales-filter-search').find('#search_inputs');
                let $filtersPreviewList = $('.lv-mobile-filter__block .selected-filters-preview-list');

                previousSearchValue = '';
                clearFilters();

                let exists = false;
                let nameId = 0;
                $searchInputBlock.find('input').each(function (i, item) {
                    if ($(item).val() == value) {
                        exists = true;
                    }

                    nameId++;
                });

                nameId += 1;

                if (!exists && value != '') {
                    let $newSearchInput = $('<input/>', {name: 'search' + nameId, value: value});
                    $searchInputBlock.append($newSearchInput);

                    $filtersPreviewList.append(
                        '<div class="filter-preview-item filter-preview-search" data-id="search' + nameId + '">' +
                        '    <div class="filter-preview-title">' + value + '</div>' +
                        '    <div class="filter-remove-icon" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Remove"></div>' +
                        '</div>'
                    );
                }

                $inputSearch.val('');
                $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');

                //submitForm();

                //$('input[name="search"]').val('');
                //$('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');
                $('#auto_complete_mob').hide();

                //$.fancybox.close();
            }
        });

        $('body').on('click', ".ac_item_p", function() {
            let $this = $(this);
            let value = $this.data('title');
            let $inputSearch = $('input[name="search"]');
            let $searchInputBlock = $inputSearch.closest('.sales-filter-search').find('#search_inputs');
            let $filtersPreviewList = null;

            if ($this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').length) {
                $this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').addClass('item-selected');
                //$inputSearch.val(value);
                $inputSearch.val('');
                $filtersPreviewList = $('.lv-mobile-filter__block .selected-filters-preview-list');
            } else {
                $this.closest('#auto_complete').addClass('item-selected');
                $inputSearch.val('');
                $filtersPreviewList = $('.selected-filters-preview-list');
            }

            let exists = false;
            let nameId = 0;
            $searchInputBlock.find('input').each(function (i, item) {
                if ($(item).val() == value) {
                    exists = true;
                }

                nameId++;
            });

            nameId += 1;

            if (!exists) {
                let $newSearchInput = $('<input/>', {name: 'search' + nameId, value: value});
                $searchInputBlock.append($newSearchInput);

                $filtersPreviewList.append(
                    '<div class="filter-preview-item filter-preview-search" data-id="search' + nameId + '">' +
                    '    <div class="filter-preview-title">' + value + '</div>' +
                    '    <div class="filter-remove-icon" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Remove"></div>' +
                    '</div>'
                );
            }

            if ($this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').length) {
                //$.fancybox.close();
                $('.offers_search_mob').show();
                $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');

                $this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').hide();

                /*setTimeout(function () {
                    $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');
                    $('input[name="search"]').val('');
                }, 3000);*/
            } else {
                ga('send', 'event', {eventCategory: 'Filtras', eventAction: 'Search', eventLabel: value});

                // Clear all filters
                clearFilters();
                submitForm();
            }
        });
        $('body').on('keydown', ".ac_item_p", function(e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        $('body').on('click', ".ac_item_c", function() {
            let $this = $(this);
            let id = $this.data('id');
            let $value = $this.data('title');
            let $inputSearch = $('input[name="search"]');

            if ($this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').length) {
                $this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').addClass('item-selected');
            } else {
                $this.closest('#auto_complete').addClass('item-selected');
            }

            $inputSearch.val('');

            if ($this.closest('#auto_complete_mob').length) {
                $.fancybox.close();
                $('.offers_search_mob').show();
                $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');
            }

            previousSearchValue = '';
            clearFilters();
            $('#sales-filters-form .lv-filter-category.category_' + id).click();
        });
        $('body').on('keydown', ".ac_item_c", function(e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        $('.lv-filter-offers.offers_nav .lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category').on('click', function () {
            let $filter = $(this);
            let $checkbox = $filter.find('input[type="checkbox"]');

            if ($checkbox.length) {
                if ($checkbox.is(':checked')) {
                    $checkbox.prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
                    $filter.removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
                }
                else {
                    $checkbox.prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
                    $filter.addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
                }

                submitForm();
            }
        });
        $('.lv-filter-offers.offers_nav .lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category').on('keydown', function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        $('.lv-filter-offers.offers_nav .lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category').on('click', function () {
            let $filter = $(this);
            let $checkbox = $filter.find('input[type="checkbox"]');
            let checked = $checkbox.is(':checked');

            $filter.closest('.lv-filter-filters').find('.lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            $filter.closest('.lv-filter-filters').find('.lv-filter-category input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');

            if ($checkbox.length) {
                if (!checked) {
                    $checkbox.prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
                    $filter.addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
                }

                submitForm();
            }
        });
        $('.lv-filter-offers.offers_nav .lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category').on('keydown', function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        $('.selected-filters-preview-list').on('click', '.filter-preview-item .filter-remove-icon', function () {
            let $item = $(this).closest('.filter-preview-item')

            if ($item.hasClass('filter-preview-search')) {
                $('input[name="' + $item.data('id') + '"]').remove();
            }

            $item.remove();
            submitForm();
        });
        $('.selected-filters-preview-list').on('keydown', '.filter-preview-item .filter-remove-icon', function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        $('#filter_sort_by').on('change', function () {
            var value = $(this).val();
            $('input[name="sort_by"]').val(value);
            $('#sort-' + value).prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
            var title = $('.sort_mobile input[checked="checked"]').next().html().trim();
            $('.sort_mobile .lv-accordeon-alt__subtitle').html(title);
            submitForm();
        });

        $('#filter_limit').on('change', function () {
            var value = $(this).val();
            $('input[name="limit"]').val(value);
            $('#on-page-' + value).prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
            submitForm();
        });

        $('.shop').click(function () {
            let $filter = $(this);
            let $checkbox = $filter.find('input[type="checkbox"]');

            if ($checkbox.length) {
                if (!$(this).hasClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active")) {
                    $(this).addClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active");
                    $(this).find('input').attr('checked', 'checked').prop('checked', true);
                } else {
                    $(this).removeClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active");
                    $(this).find('input').attr('checked', '').prop('checked', false);
                }
            }

            submitForm();
        });
        $('.shop').on('keydown', function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

        // Mobile filters
        $('.sort_mobile input[type="radio"]').on('change', function () {
            var value = $(this).val();
            var title = $(this).next().html().trim();
            $('.sort_mobile .lv-accordeon-alt__subtitle').html(title);

            var $block = $(this).closest('.lv-accordeon-alt');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $block.removeClass('lv-accordeon-alt--active');
                $block.find('.lv-accordeon-alt__content').hide();
            }, 200);
        });

        $('.limit_mobile input[type="radio"]').on('change', function () {
            var value = $(this).val();

            var $block = $(this).closest('.lv-accordeon-alt');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $block.removeClass('lv-accordeon-alt--active');
                $block.find('.lv-accordeon-alt__content').hide();
            }, 200);
        });

        $('.shop_mobile').on('click', function () {
            if (!$(this).hasClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active")) {
                $(this).addClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active");
            } else {
                $(this).removeClass("lv-filter-x__toggle--active");
            }
        });

        $('.lv-mobile-filter .lv-mobile-categories__item .lv-filter-category').on('click', function () {
            let checked = $(this).hasClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            $('.lv-mobile-filter .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');

            if (!checked) {
                $(this).addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }

            /*if ($(this).hasClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active')) {
                $(this).removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }
            else {
                $(this).addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }*/

            var $block = $(this).closest('.lv-accordeon-alt');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $block.removeClass('lv-accordeon-alt--active');
                $block.find('.lv-accordeon-alt__content').hide();
            }, 200);
        });

        $('.lv-mobile-filter .lv-mobile-filters__item .lv-filter-category').on('click', function () {
            let checked = $(this).hasClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            $(this).closest('.lv-mobile-filter__block').find('.lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');

            if (!checked) {
                $(this).addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }

            /*if ($(this).hasClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active')) {
                $(this).removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }
            else {
                $(this).addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            }*/

            var $block = $(this).closest('.lv-accordeon-alt');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $block.removeClass('lv-accordeon-alt--active');
                $block.find('.lv-accordeon-alt__content').hide();
            }, 200);
        });

        $('.lv-mobile-filter__apply').click(function () {
            let sort = $('.sort_mobile input[name="sort"]:checked').val();
            $('input[name="sort_by"]').val(sort);
            //$('#filter_sort_by').val(sort);

            let limit = $('.limit_mobile input[name="on-page"]:checked').val();
            $('input[name="limit"]').val(limit);
            //$('#filter_limit').val(limit);

            if ($('.shop_mobile.shop-x.lv-filter-x__toggle--active').length) {
                $('.shop.shop-x input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
                $('.shop.shop-x').addClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            } else {
                $('.shop.shop-x input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
                $('.shop.shop-x').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            }

            if ($('.shop_mobile.shop-xx.lv-filter-x__toggle--active').length) {
                $('.shop.shop-xx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
                $('.shop.shop-xx').addClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            } else {
                $('.shop.shop-xx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
                $('.shop.shop-xx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            }

            if ($('.shop_mobile.shop-xxx.lv-filter-x__toggle--active').length) {
                $('.shop.shop-xxx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
                $('.shop.shop-xxx').addClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            } else {
                $('.shop.shop-xxx input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');
                $('.shop.shop-xxx').removeClass('lv-filter-x__toggle--active');
            }

            // Categories
            $('.lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            $('.lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');

            $('.lv-mobile-categories__item .lv-filter-category.lv-filter-category__toggle--active').each(function () {
                let id = $(this).data('id');
                let $category = $('.lv-filter-categories .lv-filter-category.category_' + id);
                $category.addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
                $category.find('input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
            });

            // Filters
            $('.lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category').removeClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
            $('.lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', false).attr('checked', '');

            $('.lv-mobile-filters__item .lv-filter-category.lv-filter-category__toggle--active').each(function () {
                let id = $(this).data('id');
                let $category = $('.lv-filter-filters .lv-filter-category.filter_' + id);
                $category.addClass('lv-filter-category__toggle--active');
                $category.find('input[type="checkbox"]').prop('checked', true).attr('checked', 'checked');
            });

            $.fancybox.close();
            submitForm();
        });


        $('.lv-filter__clear, .lv-mobile-filter__clear').click(function () {
            $('input[name="search_mob"]').val('');
            $('input[name="search"]').val('');

            $('#search_inputs input').remove();
            $('.selected-filters-preview-list .filter-preview-item').remove();

            clearFilters();

            if ($(this).hasClass('lv-mobile-filter__clear')) {
                $.fancybox.close();
            }

            submitForm();
        });
        $('.lv-filter__clear').keydown(function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
        });

    });

    $(window).scroll(function() {
        //let $offersBlock = $('.lv-offers');
        let $loadMoreButton = $('.lv-load-more');

        let absoluteScrollPosition = $loadMoreButton.position().top; // + $offersBlock.position().top

        //console.log($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height());
        //console.log(absoluteScrollPosition);
        //console.log('==============================================');

        if (($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height()) > absoluteScrollPosition) {
            if (typeof $('.lv-load-more').attr('loading') === "undefined") {
                $(".lv-load-more .lv-loader").click();
            }
        }

        let foundAlcohol = false;

        /*$('.item.product-alcohol').each(function(key, item) {
            if (isOnScreen(item)) {
                $('.alcohol-tooltip.alcohol-tooltip-box').show();
                foundAlcohol = true;
                return false;
            } else {
                $('.alcohol-tooltip.alcohol-tooltip-box').hide();
            }
        });*/

        // Show energy drink bottom popup
        /*if (!foundAlcohol) {
            $('.item.product-energy-drink').each(function (key, item) {
                if (isOnScreen(item)) {
                    $('.alcohol-tooltip.energy-drink-tooltip-box').show();
                    return false;
                } else {
                    $('.alcohol-tooltip.energy-drink-tooltip-box').hide();
                }
            });
        }*/
    });

    $(".lv-load-more .lv-loader").click(function () {
        var $button = $('.lv-load-more');
        var offsetCount = $("#offers_container .offer-item").length;
        var totalProducts = parseInt($("#totalProducts").val());

        $button.attr('loading', '1');

        if (offsetCount < totalProducts) {
            $(".lv-load-more").css('display', 'block');
            $button.addClass('loading');

            $.ajax({
                url: getUrlWithFilters($('#ajax-load-more-url').val()),
                dataType: 'json',
                type: 'post',
                data: {offset: offsetCount},
                cache: false,
                success: function (data) {
                    var $offers = $(data.html);
                    $("#offers_container").find('.item:last-child').focus();
                    $("#offers_container").append($offers);
                    var offsetCount = $("#offers_container .offer-item").length;

                    if (totalProducts <= offsetCount) {
                        $(".lv-load-more").hide();
                        $button.attr('loading', '2');
                        showHiddenOffersAtBottom();
                    } else {
                        setTimeout(function () {
                            $button.removeAttr('loading');
                        }, 1000);
                    }

                    $button.removeClass('loading');

                    offers.prototype.initInfoBtn($(".offers .item .info"));
                    offers.prototype.initInfoBtn($(".offers .item .tag"));
                    addCircleToOffers();
                },
                error: function (data) {}
            });
        } else {
            console.log('load');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $button.removeAttr('loading');
            }, 500);

            showHiddenOffersAtBottom();
        }
    });
    $(".lv-load-more .lv-loader").keydown(function (e) {
        if (e.keyCode == 13) $(this).trigger('click');
    });

    $('.scroll-down-wrapper').on('click', function (e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        $('html, body').animate({scrollTop: $('.lv-content').offset().top - 80}, 500, 'linear');
    });

    $('#offers_container')
        .on('mouseenter', '.item .bottom_icons .tag', function (e) {
            let $item = $(this).closest('.item');

            setTimeout(function () {
                //$item.find('.infopop').css('right', 'auto');
                $item.find('.infopop .arrow_bottom').css('right', 'auto');
            }, 1);
        })
        .on('mouseenter', '.item .info_icon .tag', function (e) {
            let $item = $(this).closest('.item');

            setTimeout(function () {
                $item.find('.infopop').css('right', '6px');
                $item.find('.infopop .arrow_top').css('right', '7px');
            }, 1);
        });

    function ga() {} // TODO: REMOVE
</script>

                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                </div>
                <div class="lv-col-md lv-footer__bottom-col lv-footer__bottom-col--right">
                    <div class="lv-footer__copyright">
                        2026 © MAXIMA Latvija. Visas tiesības rezervētas
                    </div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var supportLibsLoaded = false;
  if (!document.getElementById('form_send')) {
      window.disableCustomFormInit = true;
  }

  function dynamicallyLoadLibs() {
	  console.log('dynamicallyLoadLibs');
      if (!supportLibsLoaded) {
          supportLibsLoaded = true;
          var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
          var script = document.createElement('script');
          script.type = 'text/javascript';
          script.src = 'https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?hl=lv'
          script.setAttribute('data-cookieconsent', 'necessary');
          head.appendChild(script);

          var scriptSelect2 = document.createElement('script');
          scriptSelect2.type = 'text/javascript';
          scriptSelect2.src = '/js/front/select2/select2.min.js';
          head.appendChild(scriptSelect2);

          var scriptForms = document.createElement('script');
          scriptForms.type = 'text/javascript';
          scriptForms.src = '/js/modules/formcustom/general-script.js?1770134635';
          head.appendChild(scriptForms);

          var scriptDatepicker = document.createElement('script');
          scriptDatepicker.type = 'text/javascript';
          scriptDatepicker.src = '/js/back/plugin/jquery-datetimepicker/jquery.datetimepicker.js?1441005419';
          head.appendChild(scriptDatepicker);

          var cssSelect2 = document.createElement("link");
          cssSelect2.rel = "stylesheet";
          cssSelect2.type = "text/css";
          cssSelect2.href = "/js/front/select2/select2.min.css";
          head.appendChild(cssSelect2);

          var cssSelect3 = document.createElement("link");
          cssSelect3.rel = "stylesheet";
          cssSelect3.type = "text/css";
          cssSelect3.href = "/css/modules/formcustom/general-style.css?1770211979";
          head.appendChild(cssSelect3);

          var cssSelect4 = document.createElement("link");
          cssSelect4.rel = "stylesheet";
          cssSelect4.type = "text/css";
          cssSelect4.href = "/css/back/jquery.datetimepicker.css";
          head.appendChild(cssSelect4);
      }
  }

  function showFeedbackPopup() {
    dynamicallyLoadLibs();

    let $contentBlock = $('#feedback-popup-container .support-popup-content');
    setTimeout(function() {
        $.ajax({
          url: $contentBlock.data('url'),
          type: 'get',
          cache: false,
          success: function (data) {
            $contentBlock.html(data);

            $.fancybox.open($('#feedback-popup-container'), {
              fitToView: true,
              maxWidth: '600',
              width: '600',
              autoSize: true,
              closeClick: false,
              openEffect: 'none',
              scrolling: 'hidden',
              closeBtn: true,
              padding: 0,
              tpl: {
                closeBtn: '<a class=\"fancybox-item fancybox-close\" href=\"javascript:;\"></a>'
              },
              afterShow: function () {
                $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-skin').addClass('popup-support-form-fancybox');
                $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-skin').css('height', 'auto');
                setTimeout(function () {
                  $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner .select2').select2();
                  $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner').css('height', 'auto');
                }, 100);

                setTimeout(function () {
                  window.loadCustomForm();
                  window.customFormAllowSubmit = false;
                  grecaptcha.render('send_button');
                  //loadGeneralForm();
                  //$('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner .select2').select2();
                }, 100);
              },
              beforeClose: function () {
                window.unbindCustomFormEl();
              },
              helpers: {
                overlay: {
                  closeClick: false,
                  css : { 'overflow' : 'scroll' },
                },
              }
            });

          },
          error: function (data) {}
        });
    }, 500);
  }

  function showSupportPopup() {
    dynamicallyLoadLibs();

    let $contentBlock = $('#support-popup-container .support-popup-content');
    setTimeout(function() {
        $.ajax({
          url: $contentBlock.data('url'),
          type: 'get',
          cache: false,
          success: function (data) {
            $contentBlock.html(data);

            $.fancybox.open($('#support-popup-container'), {
              fitToView: true,
              maxWidth: '600',
              width: '600',
              autoSize: true,
              closeClick: false,
              openEffect: 'none',
              scrolling: 'hidden',
              closeBtn: true,
              padding: 0,
              tpl: {
                closeBtn: '<a class=\"fancybox-item fancybox-close\" href=\"javascript:;\"></a>'
              },
              afterShow: function () {
                $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-skin').addClass('popup-support-form-fancybox');
                $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-skin').css('height', 'auto');
                setTimeout(function () {
                  $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner .select2').select2();
                  $('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner').css('height', 'auto');
                }, 100);

                setTimeout(function () {
                  //$('#FCSupportForm_subtopic option').hide();
                  window.hideAllFormInputs();
                  window.loadCustomForm();
                  window.customFormAllowSubmit = false;
                  grecaptcha.render('send_button');

                  //loadGeneralForm();
                  //$('.fancybox-opened .fancybox-inner .select2').select2();
                }, 100);
              },
              afterClose: function () {
                window.unbindCustomFormEl();
              },
              helpers: {
                overlay: {
                  closeClick: false,
                  css : { 'overflow' : 'scroll' },
                },
              }
            });

          },
          error: function (data) {}
        });
    }, 500);

  }

  $(document).ready(function () {
    $('.js-feedback-popup').click(function () {
      //window.customFormErrorType = 'inline';
      if (window.formManualyLoaded) {
        window.location.href = '/#sazinies-ar-mums';
      } else {
        $('.support-popup-content').html('');
        showFeedbackPopup();
      }
    });

    $('.js-support-popup').click(function () {
      //window.customFormErrorType = 'inline';
      if (window.formManualyLoaded) {
        window.location.href = '/#sazinies-ar-mums';
      } else {
        $('.support-popup-content').html('');
        showSupportPopup();
      }
    });

    if (location.href.indexOf('#') > -1) {
      let urlParts = location.href.split('#');

      if (typeof urlParts[1] !== 'undefined' && urlParts[1].length > 0) {
        if (urlParts[1] == 'sazinies-ar-mums') {
          $('.support-popup-content').html('');
          showSupportPopup();
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>

    	app_.addModule('stickies');

<script type="text/plain" data-cookieconsent="statistics" async="" src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-140664913-1"></script>

<script type="text/plain" data-cookieconsent="statistics">
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  
var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
var cookieParts = decodedCookie.split(';');
for (var i = 0; i < cookieParts.length; i++) {
	var c = cookieParts[i];
	while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') { c = c.substring(1); }
	if (c.indexOf("maxima_cookie_agreement=") == 0) {
		if (typeof dataLayer !== "undefined") {
			dataLayer.push({'event': 'consent_given'}); // GTM consent push
		}
		break;
	}
}

function ga(){
  let event = 'event';
  let eventAction = '';
  let eventCategory = '';
  let eventLabel = '';

  $.each(arguments, function (i, item) { 
    switch (i) { 
	  case 1:
	    event = item; 
		break;
	  case 2:
	    if (typeof item.eventCategory !== 'undefined') {
	      eventCategory = item.eventCategory;
		  eventAction = item.eventAction;
		  eventLabel = item.eventLabel;
        }		
		break;
	}
  });
  
  if (eventAction.length > 0) {
    console.log('gtag("' + event +'", "'+ eventAction  +'", {event_category:"'+ eventCategory + '", event_label:"' + eventLabel + '", value:"' + eventLabel + '"})');
  
    gtag(event, eventAction, {
      'event_category': eventCategory,
      'event_label': eventLabel,
      'value': eventLabel
    });
  } else {
    gasend(arguments);
  }
}

  
function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
gtag('js', new Date());

gtag('config', 'UA-140664913-1');

gtag('consent', 'default', {
	'ad_storage': 'denied',
	'ad_user_data': 'denied',
	'ad_personalization': 'denied',
	'analytics_storage': 'denied'
});

console.log("gtag('consent', 'default', {\n"+
"    'ad_storage': 'denied',\n"+
"    'ad_user_data': 'denied',\n"+
"    'ad_personalization': 'denied',\n"+
"    'analytics_storage': 'denied'\n"+
"});");

function consentGrantedAdStorage() {
    var cookies = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
    var cookieParts = cookies.split(';');

    for (var i = 0; i < cookieParts.length; i++) {
	var c = cookieParts[i];
	while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') { c = c.substring(1); }
	if (c.indexOf("CookieConsent=") == 0) {
		if (c.indexOf('necessary:true') > -1 && c.indexOf('marketing:true') > -1) {
			/*var date = new Date();
			date.setTime(date.getTime() + (10*24*60*60*1000));
			document.cookie = "analytics_storage=granted; expires=" + date.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
			document.cookie = "ad_storage=granted; expires=" + date.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
			document.cookie = "ad_user_data=granted; expires=" + date.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
			document.cookie = "ad_personalization=granted; expires=" + date.toUTCString() + "; path=/";*/
			gtag('consent', 'update', {
				'ad_storage': 'granted',
				'ad_user_data': 'granted',
				'ad_personalization': 'granted',
				'analytics_storage': 'granted'
			});
			console.log("gtag('consent', 'update', {\n"+
				"    'ad_storage': 'granted',\n"+
				"    'ad_user_data': 'granted',\n"+
				"    'ad_personalization': 'granted',\n"+
				"    'analytics_storage': 'granted'\n"+
			"});");
		}
		break;
	}
    }
}

consentGrantedAdStorage();
</script>
